sentence.Network_en: Remember, keep a positive attitude and good things will happen.
sentence.Network_cn: 记住：保持乐观的心态，好事自然会发生。

sentence.Network_en: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, many are stronger at the broken places.
sentence.Network_cn: 生活总是让我们遍体鳞伤，但到后来，那些受伤的地方会变得更坚强。

sentence.Network_en: For what do we live, but to make sport for our neighbours, and laugh at them in our turn?
sentence.Network_cn: 我们活着是为了什么？不就是给邻居当笑柄，再反过来笑他们。

the chewed corn cob and soft drink came from a chicken restaurant where Beckham ate on Thursday night . the seller was also auctioning the plate and knife and fork he had used at the restaurant .而啃了一半的玉米棒和快喝完的可乐是上周四晚小贝在一家炸鸡店进餐时吃剩下的。小贝在这家餐厅用的盘子和刀叉也被卖家拿到了网上
soil and fertilizers and agricultural sustainable development ., 土壤肥料与农业可持续发展.
Bank Merger and... ... 公司并购： Corporate Merger and Acquisition 并购重组： Merger and Acquisition and Recombine.

jx.jx_en_mean: either or both of two stated possibilities

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  and, ond, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch en and German und

entry.tran: （连接两个以上的单词、词组或子句）和，与，同
entry.def: You use and to link two or more words, groups, or clauses.

example.ex: When he returned, she and Simon had already gone...
example.tran: 他回来时，她和西蒙已经走了。

example.ex: Between 1914 and 1920 large parts of Albania were occupied by the Italians...
example.tran: 在1914年至1920年间阿尔巴尼亚的大部分地区被意大利人占据。

entry.tran: （连接两个相同的单词或短语，以强调某事物的程度、暗示某事继续发生或在一段时间内不断增加）接连，越…越…
entry.def: You use and to link two words or phrases that are the same in order to emphasize the degree of something, or to suggest that something continues or increases over a period of time.

example.ex: Learning becomes more and more difficult as we get older...
example.tran: 随着年龄增长，学习变得越来越难。

example.ex: Day by day I am getting better and better...
example.tran: 我在一天天地好转。

entry.tran: （连接两件相继发生的事件）然后，就
entry.def: You use and to link two statements about events when one of the events follows the other.

example.ex: I waved goodbye and went down the stone harbour steps...
example.tran: 我挥手告别，然后走下港口石阶。

example.ex: He asked for ice for his whiskey and proceeded to get drunk.
example.tran: 他要求给他的威士忌里面加冰，接着喝得大醉。

entry.tran: （连接两句话，第二句话的意思是第一句的延伸）则，而
entry.def: You use and to link two statements when the second statement continues the point that has been made in the first statement.

example.ex: You could only really tell the effects of the disease in the long term, and five years wasn't long enough...
example.tran: 真的，这种病只能在很久以后才能看出它的影响，而5年的时间还不够长。

example.ex: The cure for bad teaching is good teachers, and good teachers cost money.
example.tran: 解决教学质量差的办法就是请好的教师，但请好的教师是需要花钱的。

entry.tran: （连接两个从句，表示因果关系）那么，于是
entry.def: You use and to link two clauses when the second clause is a result of the first clause.

example.ex: All through yesterday crowds have been arriving and by midnight thousands of people packed the square.
example.tran: 昨天陆续有大批人到来，午夜时有几千人聚集在广场上。

entry.tran: （表示停顿，以便对所说的话进行评论）再说，而
entry.def: You use and to interrupt yourself in order to make a comment on what you are saying.

example.ex: As Downing claims, and as we noted above, reading is best established when the child has an intimate knowledge of the language...
example.tran: 如唐宁所说，也正如我们前文所指出的，当孩子对语言非常熟悉时，阅读的效果最佳。

example.ex: Finally — and I really ought to stop in a minute — I wish to make the following recommendations.
example.tran: 最后——我确实应该停一下——我想作以下推荐。

entry.tran: （用于句首，引出补充说明）还有，不过
entry.def: You use and at the beginning of a sentence to introduce something else that you want to add to what you have just said. Some people think that starting a sentence with and is ungrammatical, but it is now quite common in both spoken and written English.

example.ex: Commuter airlines fly to out-of-the-way places. And business travelers are the ones who go to those locations.
example.tran: 支线航空公司航班飞往偏僻地区。商务旅客就是会前往那些地区的人。

entry.tran: （用以引导与某人之谈话有关的问句）那么，还有
entry.def: You use and to introduce a question which follows logically from what someone has just said.

example.ex: 'He used to be so handsome.' — 'And now?'...
example.tran: “他以前是那么英俊。”——“那么现在呢？”

example.ex: 'Well, of course, they haven't won a football game.' — 'And what would you expect?'.
example.tran: “嗯，当然，他们一场足球比赛也没有赢过。”——“那么你所期望的是什么呢？”

entry.tran: （广播员等用以转换话题或讨论刚才提及的话题）也
entry.def: And is used by broadcasters and people making announcements to change a topic or to start talking about a topic they have just mentioned.

example.ex: And now the drought in Sudan...
example.tran: 现在苏丹也有旱情。

example.ex: Football, and Aston Villa will reclaim their lead at the top of the English First Division.
example.tran: 来看足球，阿斯顿维拉队将在英格兰甲级联赛重登榜首。

entry.def: You use and to indicate that two numbers are to be added together.

example.ex: What does two and two make?
example.tran: 2加2等于几？

entry.def: And is used before a fraction that comes after a whole number.

example.ex: McCain spent five and a half years in a prisoner of war camp in Vietnam.
example.tran: 麦凯恩在越南的战俘营里度过了5年半的时间。

example.ex: ...fourteen and a quarter per cent.

entry.tran: （用在大于一百的数字中，置于百位或千位之后，十位及个位之前）
entry.def: You use and in numbers larger than one hundred, after the words 'hundred' or 'thousand' and before other numbers.

example.ex: We printed two hundred and fifty invitations.
example.tran: 我们印了250份请柬。

example.ex: ...three thousand and twenty-six pounds.

list.explanation: (陆军用语) 值班时经常或故意不到的人(尤指军人)

example.en: Do you know why he always was the sick lame and lazy?
example.zh: 你知逍他为什么老是不来值班？

list.explanation: 脱逃

example.en: He jumped into a car and made his cop and heal.
example.zh: 他跳上辆汽车仓惶逃走了。

list.explanation: 心上人，未婚妻，恋人

example.en: My one and only!What am I going to do if you turn me down when I'm so crazy over you?
example.zh: 我的心上人啊!我对你如此痴情，你要是不肯嫁给我，叫我如何是好？

list.explanation: (=pepper and salt)(吸毒者用语)含杂质的或劣质的大麻

example.en: This salt and pepper is oregano, I think.
example.zh: 我有这种含杂质的大麻是牛至吐粉。

list.explanation: 黑白色相M间的警车
(大学用语)过得很快活

example.en: We'll jive and juke in this summer vacation.
example.zh: 今年暑假我们会过得很快活的。

list.explanation: (通称)警察，警官

example.en: Old nail-em-and-jail-em is going to be knocking at your door any day now.
example.zh: 现在老警察会随时上门来找你。

list.explanation: 裤子
跑(尤指飞奔)

example.en: Pick'em up and lay'em down for the doctor.
example.zh: 赶快去请医生

list.explanation: 跳舞

example.en: He picked'em up and laid'em down his feel tired.
example.zh: 他跳舞跳得腿都酸了。

list.explanation: [戏剧用语]很小的角色(指台词极少甚至咳嗽一声就下台的角色〉

example.en: He played a cough and a spit in this show.
example.zh: 他在这出戏里演了个很不起眼的小角色。

list.explanation: (政党、组织等的)普通成员，基层

example.en: The rank and file will vote on it tomorrow.
example.zh: 普通成员明天将对其进行投票表决。

list.explanation: 很容易的事，吃喝玩乐，享受

example.en: Did you think life was all beer and skittles?
example.zh: 你以为生活就是吃喝玩乐吗？

list.explanation: (为了宣传或推销等目的而精心安排的)盛举、盛大表演或讲演等事

example.en: Bring them in here and do a dog and pony act.
example.zh: 把他们领进来开开眼界见见大世面。

example.en: Wally was there with his dog and pony show about water safety.
example.zh: 韦利曾在那里作过关于水上保险的演讲。

list.explanation: 仆人，奴仆

example.en: You might consider taking a job here with me, wooden-and-water joey，general rouseabout.
example.zh: 你也许可以考虑跟我一起在这里干活当佣人，打杂。

list.explanation: [黑人用语]警察，警官

example.en: Mike got hit by Sam and Dave last night.
example.zh: 迈克昨晚上遭到警察殴打了。

list.explanation: 无稽之谈，言过其实的报导，荒诞的故事，未必确实的事情或言谈

example.en: This newspaper account is a cock-and-bull.
example.zh: 这篇新闻报导是无稽之谈。

example.en: He gives me this cock-and-bull story about six flat tyres.
example.zh: 他居然跟我胡说什么轮胎漏了六次气。

list.explanation: (处于)被抛弃的、孤立无援的、困苦的(状态或境地)

example.en: Here I sit high and dry—no food, no money, no nothing.
example.zh: 在这儿我孤立无援——没有食物，没有钱，一无所有。

example.en: The old man was left high and dry.
example.zh: 那老人孤苦伶仃。

slang.tokens: play fast and loose with somebody

list.explanation: (对待某人或某事物)行为反复无常，处事轻率、忽冷忽热

example.en: He was playing fast and loose with his girlfriend. So she left him.
example.zh: 他对他的女友老是忽冷忽热，于是她离开了他。

list.explanation: 诚实的，可靠的，光明磊落的

example.en: It' s an up-and-up place.
example.zh: 这是一个很循规蹈矩的地方。

example.en: Everything I do is on the up-and-up. I am totally honest.
example.zh: 我所做的一切都是光明磊落的。我是绝对诚实的。

list.explanation: 厌恶的(地)，卑鄙的 (地)，心术不正的(地)，尔虞我诈的(地)

example.en: a down and dirty campaign
example.zh: 尔虞我诈的竞选运动

Sentence.sentence: Since then, several academic institutions have begun to require IDPs for post docs And in June, the U.S. National Institutes of Health (NIH) Biomedical Research Workforce Working Group recommended that the NIH require IDPs for the approximately 32,000 postdoctoral researchers they support.

sentences.en: He likes to play football and to sing popular songs.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢踢足球和唱流行歌曲。

sentences.en: There are three hundred and sixty-five students in this school.
He lost his health, and therefore his difficulties increased.
sentences.cn: 他身体虚弱, 因此更增加了他的困难。
玛丽是个高个子的金发女郎。

sentences.en: Joan was rich, beautiful and proud.
sentences.cn: 琼非常有钱, 漂亮且庄重。

jushi.english: There are three hundred and sixty-five students in this school.
Everyone wished the speaker would stop,but he talked on and on.
jushi.chinese: 每个人都希望发言者停下来,然而他老是说个没完。

jushi.english: She can speak English and French.
